ModMetaData.name: I'm Proud of it!
ModMetaData.author: ZreX
ModMetaData.description:
Pawn will gain a sense of pride after crafting a high-quality item or building a monument! Conversely, crafting a shoddy product will lead to frustration. 角色在制作出高品质物品或完成纪念碑后将会获得自豪感（心情加成）。可选地，制作出劣质产品也会感受到挫败。
The mood bonus is influenced by item quality, the pawn's crafting skill, and the amount of work. As a baseline, crafting a "Good" quality Chain Shotgun with a Crafting skill of 8 grants a +4 mood bonus for one day. These values can be viewed and adjusted in the mod's settings. 心情加成与物品品质、角色的手工技能等级以及工作量有关。作为基准，拥有8级手工技能的角色制作出“良好”品质的链式霰弹枪，将获得为期一天的+4心情加成。这些数值可以在模组的设置中查看和调整。
-----------------------------------------
Source code can be found in https://github.com/ZreXoc/RimMod-Im_Proud_of_it 源代码可以在 https://github.com/ZreXoc/RimMod-Im_Proud_of_it 找到
